line_1: And, faster than the dropping fount,
line_2: There shall my plaintive song recount

line_1: And, led in vision, drank at Siloe's fount,
line_2: So to the dark-brow'd wood, or sacred mount,

line_1: Him AVON deplor'd, Him the Nymph of the Fount,
line_2: Him mourn'd all the Dryads on CLAVERTON's Mount;
